title: Spacious Walk-in Closet, New Applicances, Up to 10 Weeks + $1500!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 222', 'OR Text', '222', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 629 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Sophisticated apartment living is arriving at the intersection of Broadway and Piedmont.', 'Studio, one and two bedroom spaces feature unmatched amenities never before seen in Oakland.', 'With the genuine fixtures and modern finishes, you’ll love the stylish comfort of staying right at home.', '<URL>', 'Features:', 'Equipped Kitchens, Patio/Balcony*, Stainless Steel Appliances (Gas Range), Walk-In Closets*, Key-less front door entry, High Speed Internet & Cable Ready, USB outlets, Sleek Finishes w/Quartz Counter-top, Central AC/Heating in all units, Brand New Apartments, Carpet & Wood Style Floors, Garbage Disposal, Double Pane Windows', 'Community Amenities:', 'Hammock Park, Pet Spa, Controlled Access Building, Onsite Management 7 days, Outdoor Fireplaces, Rooftop Lounge, Courtesy Patrol, Bocce Ball Court, Dog Run, Bike Storage, Luxury Living, Package Lockers, Courtyard w/ BBQs, Car Charging Station, Door to Door Trash Pick-Up (Valet Living), Fitness Center, Maintenance Emergency 24/7, Resident Clubhouse, Laundry Lockers, Brand New Building, Yoga Studio, Onsite Storage, Swimming Pool & Spa', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet friendly community.', 'However, we do have breed restrictions.', 'Please check with leasing team for further details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Must earn (gross household income) 2.5 times amount of rent', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'YkdUe7DE']
